metadata.synopsis: One liner dialog for one of the guards on the ground floor of the Fireworks House in Lower City.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the guard on the ground  floor of the Fireworks House in Lower city, next to Avery Sonschal.

0.speaker: Feloguard Liadan
0.text: Any torches, matches, wizards, or other sources of open flame, keep them unlit, please.

1.speaker: Feloguard Liadan
1.text: Mephits are allowed, but only the non-magma kind.
